it.polimi.sw2019.network.server.rmi

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerImplementation

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Author:
    Mi97ch interface for RMI server side

      • messageHandler

        void messageHandler(Message message)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Used by RMI connection use the message from the client to get the parameters of the method called
        Parameters:
        message - message received
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - error in connection

      • register

        void register(java.lang.String username,
              ClientInterface clientInterface)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        used during the login phase of the player
        Parameters:
        username - nickname chose by the player
        clientInterface - used by server to create the new Client class
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - error in connection

      • reconnect

        void reconnect(java.lang.String username,
               ClientInterface clientInterface)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        used to reconnect a client
        Parameters:
        username - client to reconnect
        clientInterface - new type of connection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - in case of errore in connection
